title: (x) Alzheimer's Association logo - TheMix {Stephen}
content:
what font is used for the alzheimer's association? Is it custom or available for purchase?

[www.alz.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20111020180205/http:/www.alz.org/ "www.alz.org")
author: vector

comments.content: Hey, that's my work's font : [http://www.utas.edu.au/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111020180205/http:/www.utas.edu.au/ "http://www.utas.edu.au/") they team that with a bit of grotesque MT
TheMix is the wrong answer. Can anyone come up with a better answer?

The shoddy rendering notwithstanding, [TheMix](http://web.archive.org/web/20111020180205/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/lucasfonts/themix_extra_bold_sixpack/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=74&sample_text=alz.org&ft=liga&affid=99346) is indeed used for the logo. Are you seeing something I'm not?

The logo is too small to see. Here is a grab from [http://www.alz.org/CAdata/FullReport2009.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20111020180205/http:/www.alz.org/CAdata/FullReport2009.pdf "http://www.alz.org/CAdata/FullReport2009.pdf")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111020180205im_/http:/typophile.com/files/alzheimer_5395.jpg)
  
(There was some customization).
